job.title: Software Engineer--Back End
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: Imagine a world dedicated to Security Without Compromise. Synack, headquartered in Silicon Valley with regional offices around the world, protects leading global organizations by reducing companies' security risk and increasing their resistance to cyber attack. How do we do this? By utilizing the world's best and most trusted team of ethical hackers who test through our powerful and controlled platform to deliver real security without compromise. At Synack, we aren't afraid to think outside the box or take on big challenges. Backed by top-tier venture capital firms including Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, Microsoft, and Google Ventures, Synack's mission is to leverage global security talent coupled with advanced technology to help enterprises discover security vulnerabilities before they become business problems. Discover the possibilities at Synack!This remote role is a unique opportunity to help build platforms that will revolutionize cyber security. As a Back End Software Engineer, you will have no shortage of interesting and challenging projects to work on! You love to learn, are excited about cybersecurity and want to be part of our fast-paced, collaborative team making an immediate impact by building scalable web applications. Sounds interesting? Keep reading…Here's What You'll DoExtract features from a Ruby on Rails monolith into highly available fault tolerant servicesDesign and develop fault tolerant, high availability systems that can elegantly deal with disruptions in serviceCollaborate with engineers across the companyHave a voice on architecture, implementation, and engineering processIdentify best practices and areas for improvement and drive those initiativesWork closely with our product and design teams to define feature specificationsHere's What You'll NeedBS degree in CS or equivalent experience3+ years of experience in a Ruby on Rail environmentExperience using various database systems such as PostgreSQLExperience with unit and integration tests, using technologies such as Rspec and CapybaraBonus PointsExperience with Go in a production environment is a big plus! If you don't know Go, you can learn it here!Experience working with Google Cloud Platform or other Cloud Computing platformsContribution to open source projectExperience with DockerExperience in DB query optimizationExperience working with websocketReady to join us?Synack is committed to embracing diversity. Our people are our strength. Each addition to our team is an opportunity to grow and diversify our ideas, experiences, and viewpoints. We strive to be inclusive of Race, Ethnicity, Religion, Sex, LGBTQ+, Veterans, Disabilities, and Age. Synack welcomes you!
